title: How to fix the unspecified error check logs
body:
I've tried plenty of different solutions to try fixing this problem and I ended up fixing it pretty simply just by messing with some things and finding my own solution. 

    I know there's still a bit of people having this problem and it is actually annoying so i wanted to help the one that don't know about this way and hopefully it works for those the main solutions didn't...

replies.body: Ayyyyyy I'm glad you were able to get this fixed up on your own! You've done a pretty good job of explaining the steps here, but I wanted to mention that messing with some of the files in there could potentially be harmful. If anyone tries this method, be cautious and feel free to reach out to our tech team for assistance.
